metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5814 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
In the Linux Kernel before version 4.16.11, 4.14.43, 4.9.102, and 4.4.133,multiple race condition errors when handling probe, disconnect, and rebindoperations can be exploited to trigger a use-after-free condition or a NULLpointer dereference by sending multiple USB over IP packets.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5814` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-130.156
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-130.156
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-lowlatency - 4.4.0-130.156
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1092-raspi2 - 4.4.0-1092.100
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1095-snapdragon - 4.4.0-1095.100
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1129-aws - 4.4.0-1062.71
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-143-generic - 4.15.0-33.36~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-143-generic - 4.15.0-33.36~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-143-lowlatency - 4.15.0-33.36~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1114-azure - 4.15.0-1022.22~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1099-gcp - 4.15.0-1018.19~16.04.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1094-kvm - 4.4.0-1029.34
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-1102-aws - 4.15.0-1030.31~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1071-oracle - 4.15.0-1007.9~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-130.156').
